messages.content: Thank you for taking the time to apply for a postal vote for the general election. South Norfolk could see a very close result this time and every vote will be vital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The choice here in South Norfolk is between me and the Conservative candidate.

leaflet.personalStatement: Most people realise that neither Labour nor the Conservatives are really committed to changing the current discredited system. They have too many vested interests. This means that the Liberal Democrats are the only party that will fight for a fairer Britain.

contactInformation.address: Election Headquarters, The Street, Long Stratton, Norwich NR15 2XG

quotes.text: Most people agree that Lib Dem leader Nick Clegg put both Brown and Cameron in the shade and won hands down.
